generated_body: The article titled "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu" is likely to explore the strategic reasons behind the enduring presence of the Filet-O-Fish sandwich at McDonald's, despite other menu items coming and going. The article may also delve into aspects like seasonal sales trends or cultural significance, providing insights into how this particular item has maintained its relevance in a competitive fast-food market.
